# NSScrubber.Alignment.leading

**Case**

Leading alignment of items within the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
case leading
```

## Discussion

Leading alignment depends on the writing direction of the system language. Alignment is to the left for left-to-right languages, and to the right for right-to-left languages.

## Constants

- **NSScrubber.Alignment.center**: Center alignment of items within the scrubber.
- **NSScrubber.Alignment.none**: No preference for item alignment.
- **NSScrubber.Alignment.trailing**: Trailing alignment of items within the scrubber.
